authors: Furman JM, Marcus DA.
title: A pilot study of rizatriptan and visually-induced motion sickness in migraineurs
citation: Furman JM, Marcus DA. A pilot study of rizatriptan and visually-induced motion sickness in migraineurs.  International Journal of Medical Sciences 2009;6(4):212-7. [CENTRAL: CN-00721128] CENTRAL [PMID: 19680473]    Link to article     PubMed     Google Scholar
exclusion_reason: This study is not an assessment of medications used to treat acute attacks of vestibular migraine. Instead, it aims to assess whether prophylactic treatment with triptans might improve motion sickness symptoms in those with vestibular migraine, when subjected to a vestibular stimulus.
